<?php
    /* PUT data comes in on the stdin stream */
    $putdata = fopen(""php://input"", ""r"");
    
    /* Open a file for writing */
    $fp = fopen(""myputfile.ext"", ""w"");
    
    /* Read the data 1 KB at a time
       and write to the file */
    while ($data = fread($putdata, 1024))
      fwrite($fp, $data);
    
    /* Close the streams */
    fclose($fp);
    fclose($putdata);
    ?>
